top.title: India and EU announce 'mother of all trade deals'
top.summary: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

top.title: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
top.summary: The US president is sending border tsar Tom Homan to the city in an apparent shift in tone from the White House.

top.title: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
top.summary: At least a dozen people have died in multiple US states possibly due to the storm, officials have said.

top.title: California probes US TikTok over claims it censors anti-Trump content
top.summary: Thousands of people claim political content is being suppressed after a deal to spin off the US version of the app was signed last week.

top.title: Legal action over 'unfair' Steam game store prices given go ahead
top.summary: Millions of gamers could get compensation if the lawsuit - which accuses Valve of charging inflated prices - succeeds.

top.title: Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp to trial premium subscriptions
top.summary: Under the plan, access to the Meta platforms' core services would remain free.

title.#text: Google Photos now lets you describe how to transform images into video
Roland’s TR-1000 is the ultimate drum machine
